item.title: Website logistics
item.description: After committing and pushing get stucked: for uncommited changes: git commit -m “Your commit message” git rebase origin/master 2. discard unstaged changes (note that directly copying from website will give a single - instead of consecutive two -): git checkout – . 3. for “already exists” branch: git branch -d branch_name 4. use link to restore. To create a new blog: terminal (top of the mac computer) – new terminal – type hugo new blog/name.

item.title: Test
item.description: This is a page about »Test«. Generating Functions Generating functions can be regarded as algebraic objects whose formal manipulation allows us to count the number of possibilities for a problem by means of algebra. Definition Let $h_0, h_1, h_2, h_3, \ldots$ be an infinite sequence of numbers. Its generating function is defined to be the infinite series: $$ g(x) = h_0 + h_1x + h_2x^2 + \cdots + h_nx^n + \cdots $$

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description:
For a quick cheatsheet, check out https://simplemde.com/markdown-guide.

This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Bear
item.description: Bear Website: https://bearblog.dev There is a website obesity crisis. Bloated websites are full of scripts, ads, and trackers slowing your readers down every time they try to read your well-crafted content. Bear is all you need to build a fantastic and optimized site or blog. It works perfectly on any viewing device. All you need to focus on is writing good content. Bear makes it simple to publish content online and grow an audience while keeping pages tiny, fast, and optimized for search engines.
